These lasers have been a bit of a secret weapon in medicine, especially famous for breaking up kidney stones and skillfully treating sensitive areas like the urethra. They’ve really transformed how urological conditions are treated, balancing top-notch care with minimally invasive techniques.
metaTitle: Holmium Lasers For Sale - The Laser Agent
metaDescription: Holmium lasers are surgical systems that treat lithotripsy or the removal of stones in the bladder, kidneys, ureters or urethra. Shop for used Holmium Lasers.
